https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xIPgbuGcorPbOs2l3dVyaQbDboW.jpg Brigsby Bear Adventures is a children's TV show produced for an audience of one: James. When the show abruptly ends, James's life changes forever, and he sets out to finish the story himself. Brigsby Bear
